name: Azure IoT Hub with HTTP
description:
This project shows you how to send data to Microsoft Azure IoT Hub using HTTP protocol.
It will read the temperature from the Grove Temperature Sensor, then sends it to the Azure IoT Hub.

See the details in the sample's README in GitHub: https://github.com/intel-iot-devkit/iot-devkit-samples/tree/iss2018-update1/azure-http

hwreq: Grove Temperature Sensor (GroveTemp) connected to a Grove Base Shield Analog In Port

service_provider_description: Microsoft's On-demand cloud computing platform for building, testing, deploying, and managing applications and services through a global network of Microsoft-managed data centers.

additional_fields.name: Connection String
additional_fields.description: The device connection string as defined inside your Azure* IoT Hub
